channel.title: :eek: :eek: Need Bad Help with NO-IP Please HELP! :eek: :eek:
channel.description: I can't get this to work, i have tried everything, i am not sure if i am port forwarding right, or anything like that, and i don't want to use hamachi. I have tried, all this stuff. But still, no works. PLEASE HELP!!!
